resources.string: Sorry, your PC\'s OS (%1$s) doesn\'t supported now

Wait for few seconds please and piHotKeys get an access to your computer automatically.

 If you still see this message after 10 seconds passed than you need to make a simple set up on your computer:

 1. Download and install piServer application from the following website pilgr.com

 2. For wireless control of your computer, connect this device and computer to the same Wi-Fi network 

 If you use USB connection then just install a driver for your device and restart piServer on your computer. Make sure that tick "USB debugging" is set in the preferences "Applications/Development"

 3. Restart piHotKeys and wait until it connects your computer automatically
